subject: Super Bowl
Football
lead_paragraph: Ted Thompson returned to his home state, not as the villain who expedited Brett Favre’s departure from Green Bay, but as the general manager who crafted the Packers’ post-Favre resurgence.
snippet: Ted Thompson returned to his home state, not as the villain who expedited Brett Favre’s departure from Green Bay, but as the general manager who crafted the Packers’ post-Favre resurgence.
